definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc

sentences.english: The sugar-cane is taken to the factory where the juice is crushed out.
sentences.chinese: 甘蔗被运到工厂中去榨汁。

sentences.english: Which, briefly, is like an explosion in a spear factory.
sentences.chinese: 简单地说，就像兵工厂发生了爆炸。

sentences.english: Its Tochigi and Iwaki plants, north of Tokyo, would remain shut until Friday.
sentences.chinese: 位于东京北部枥木和磐城的工厂将停产至周五。

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工厂须领有加工厂废水排放许可证。

sentences.english: The facility should have a process waste water discharge permit.
sentences.chinese: 受核工厂须领有加工厂废水排放许可证。

sentences.english: Then consider how Pakistan is rapidly expanding its arsenal of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 再想想巴基斯坦是如何快速扩张它的核武器兵工厂的。

sentences.english: The boss kicked Tom out of the factory.
sentences.chinese: 老板把汤姆踢出工厂大门。

sentences.english: How do they decide what to produce within their factory?
sentences.chinese: 他们如何决策工厂生产的是什么产品？

sentences.english: The authors have designed the casting process of the housing part from a factory.
sentences.chinese: 并结合工厂管卡零件进行了铸造工艺辅助设计。

sentences.english: There was no available automatic in that factory.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂没有可用的自动机械。

sentences.english: In the South-East part of the complex there was a wine presser.
sentences.chinese: 遗迹的西南部是一个葡萄酒加工厂。

sentences.english: She is in a different city as a factory worker.
sentences.chinese: 她的妈妈阮和平在另一座城市的工厂打工。

sentences.english: The plant has been designed to treat incoming waste of a wide cross-section of physical properties and packaging.
sentences.chinese: 根据设计，工厂可以处理不同属性和包装的废料。

sentences.english: If chemical resistance is in question, in-plant tests are suggested.
sentences.chinese: 如果对抗化学性有疑问，建议进行工厂内部测试。

sentences.english: Enemy agents plotted to blow up the plant.
sentences.chinese: 敌人奸细密谋炸毁那家工厂。

sentences.english: Flooding forced the closure of manufacturing plants in Ayutthaya, according to news reports.
sentences.chinese: 据新闻报道，洪水已迫使大城府的制造工厂关闭。

definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
a building used as a factory/factory (building)/CL:座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
to produce/to manufacture/to give birth to a child
to put into production/to put into operation
